TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusButtonEventHandler(object sender, StylusButtonEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusButtonEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles either the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusButtonDown"> event or the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusButtonUp> event of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
